sentences.en: And independent filaker Scud returns this year with another gay - themed Hong Kong drama,'Amphetamine.
sentences.cn: 独立制片云翔今年带来的是另一部以同恋为主题的香港片《安非他命》.

sentences.cn: 济南哪里有卖飞毛腿或其他品牌手机电池的, 想要买L7的电池.

sentences.en: Launch Scuds – Fires many, inaccurate Scud missiles at the target ( costs per use )
sentences.cn: 射飞毛腿:朝目标射很多打不准的飞毛腿 ( 使用要钱 )

sentences.en: Scud company founded in 1997 and headquartered in Fuzhou, is a collection high - tech enterprises Group.

sentences.en: The helpers came in a scud.
The scud had banked over the moon, and it was now quite dark.
sentences.cn: 飘飞的雾,蒙住月亮, 夜色幽暗.

sentences.en: You don't think I'm going to let you keep that SCUD storm , do ya?
sentences.cn: 你不会认为我会让你保有生化死雨吧?

words.tran_cn: 疾行；掠过；顺风疾驶；擦掉…的污垢（scud的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: （尤指船、舰或云彩）笔直、高速而平稳地移动
